message.body: Hey, when do you need the cake for this weekend?
I was actually Judy texting you. My mom is in the hospital. I don't Think we're going to have it. We're trying to get in touch with every one. Her kidneys are failing.
Oh wow! Im sorry to hear that
Yeah. Apparently she knew but didn't want to miss Ryans birthday. She obviously has no idea about her surprise party.
Well that's a good thing (didn't know about hers).. but hope everything works, keep me posted
I will thank you. Sorry about this. We will still end up doing something just when she is home. I'll let you know.
